title: Ownership and personal use of laptop/netbook computers 2012 , by country
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of population in the y axis.
Country Italy has the highest Percentage of population and United States has the lowest Percentage of population.
The Percentage of population of Country Italy is 1.18% larger than the minimum value at United States.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of population in the y axis.
The Percentage of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country United States.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of population in the y axis.
Country Italy has the highest Percentage of population and United States has the lowest Percentage of population.
The Percentage of population of Country Italy is 1.18% larger than the minimum value at United States.
max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Percentage of population in each Country on the y axis.
The Percentage of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country United States.
Second maximum Percentage of population is found at Country United Kingdom.
The difference of Percentage of population between the highest and lowest Country is 12.0.
Country Italy is higher than any other Countrys with value 80.0, followed by United Kingdom, and Germany. Down to Country United States with the lowest value 68.0.
Similar Percentage of population is found in Country Australia, and Spain.
The Country United States tends to be 1.11 percent lower than average.
The Percentage of population is 579.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
